## EnrollmentContext.getUser() method

Returns user identity in a form of a username.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getUser(): User;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`User`

## Remarks

The user may be authenticated or not. If authenticated, the username will be produced from the authentication token claims.
